resources.string: The game where debates come to die.

1. Get a friend that you want to debate
2. Pick a category for your debate topic
3. Click start if you're satisfied with the topic or Randomize to get another one
4. Once you start, pick a side for your debate then get started!

1. Each side will have a 1 minute opening statement to introduce the topic and their position
2. Following the opening statements, each side will have a 30 second counterargument to refute their opponents points
3. Finally, each side will have a 30 second rebuttal to defend themselves from their opponent's counter
4. When the debate is over the competitors or a third-party will have the opportunity to select who they believe won the debate
